channel.title: Focus Podcast - CareerFastTrack
channel.description: 'If I knew then what I know now!' ... some very successful people share the secrets of their success.

item.title: Rob Stewart, VP Marketing for Xerox Office Systems
item.description: Rob Stewart, VP Marketing for Xerox Office Systems talks about his career to date. Career Fast Track brings you advice from successful people for those who are still early in their careers.

item.title: Shane Redding, MD for ThinkDirect and Chair of the Institute of Direct Marketing Business to Business Council
item.description: Shane Redding, Chair of the Institute of Direct Marketing Business to Business Council talks about her career. Career Fast Track brings you advice from successful people for those who are still early in their careers.

item.title: Marketing Agency MD, Ann Brine
item.description: Ann Brine, MD of AMB Marketing (www.ambmarketing.co.uk) talks about her career in marketing and management, how she got started, and how she has managed to build a very successful career at the same time as enjoying her young family. Career Fast Track brings you advice from successful people for those who are still early in their careers.

item.title: Senior European IT Marketing Director, Steve Jack
item.description: Steve Jack is Senior European Marketing Director of an international business in the IT Industry and he has a passion for communicating. Listening to him will enliven your day and give you enthusiasm for tomorrow and the day after! Career Fast Track brings you advice from successful people for those who are still early in their careers.

item.title: Advertising Agency MD, Richard Knight
item.description: Richard Knight is MD of Focal Point Advertising (www.focal.co.uk) and he has built a successful advertising agency. Richard always dreamed of having his own business but it wasn’t all easy. Career Fast Track brings you advice from successful people for those who are still early in their careers.

item.title: Chartered Accountant, Roger Williams
item.description: Roger Williams is a Chartered Accountant and a partner in Wilkins Kennedy (www.wilkinskennedy.com). As an accountant he sees people and businesses at every stage of their development and has some very useful perspectives on what every business needs to succeed. Career Fast Track brings you advice from successful people for those who are still early in their careers.
